scripts.dev-proxy: npm run build && SET NODE_ENV=development && SET DEV_SERVER=1 && vite
scripts.build: npm run clean_build && npm run create_version && npm run create_prerelease
scripts.clean_build: tsc && npm run delete && vite build
scripts.create_pre_dist: npm run prepare_pre_version && cpx versions_prerelease.json docs && npm run prepare_pre_dist && npm run copy_pre_assets
scripts.prepare_pre_dist: cpx versions.json docs && cpx manifest.json docs/dev && cpx plugin_formit.js docs/dev
scripts.prepare_pre_version: cpx README.md docs && cpx build/* docs/dev
scripts.copy_pre_assets: cpx src/assets/* docs/dev/assets && cpx build/assets/* docs/dev/assets && cpx src/Addins/* docs/dev
scripts.create_dist: npm run prepare_version && cpx versions_prerelease.json docs && npm run prepare_dist && npm run copy_assets
scripts.prepare_dist: cpx versions.json docs && cpx manifest.json docs/v24_1_0 && cpx plugin_formit.js docs/v24_1_0
scripts.prepare_version: cpx README.md docs && cpx build/* docs/v24_1_0
scripts.copy_assets: cpx src/assets/* docs/v24_1_0/assets && cpx build/assets/* docs/v24_1_0/assets && cpx src/Addins/* docs/v24_1_0
